00036 #define smartAssert(e) \
00037         if(!(e)) { \
00038                 printf("Assertion Failed: %s\n", #e); \
00039                 printf("            File: %s\n", __FILE__); \
00040                 printf("        Function: %s\n", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \
00041                 printf("            Line: %d\n", __LINE__); \
00042                 exit(1); \
00043         }
00044 
00045 #define smartAssertMessage(e, fmt, ...) \
00046         if(!(e)) { \
00047                 printf("Assertion Failed: %s\n", #e); \
00048                 printf("            File: %s\n", __FILE__); \
00049                 printf("        Function: %s\n", __PRETTY_FUNCTION__); \
00050                 printf("            Line: %d\n", __LINE__); \
00051                 printf("         Message: "); \
00052                 printf(fmt, __VA_ARGS__); \
00053                 printf("\n"); \
00054                 exit(1); \
00055         }
